de.arm.bot.ki

Class KI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arm.bot.ki.KI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelOneKI

    public abstract class KI
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class containing the basic fields and methods for implementing the KI for each level. Every used KI should be a child of this class
    Author:
    Team ARM

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Maze maze
      The maze containing all gotten information of the current maze
      protected java.awt.Point newPosition
      A point containing the position, the player should reach in the next turn if his action was successful
      protected java.util.HashMap<Cell,java.util.List<Cell>> pathToTake
      A map containing paths calculated by the A* algorithm for chosen goal cells

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected KI(Maze maze)
      Default constructor for the KI, initializes all fields and sets the current maze

        A map containing paths calculated by the A* algorithm for chosen goal cells

    • Constructor Detail

      • KI

        protected KI(Maze maze)
        Default constructor for the KI, initializes all fields and sets the current maze
        Parameters:
        maze - The maze the KI should work on

    • Method Detail

      • calculateMove

        protected abstract Action calculateMove(TurnInfo turnInfo)
        Calculates the next move based on the current status and the given TurnInfo the bot should take. This is basically the brain that decides, which action the bot should take next.
        Parameters:
        turnInfo - The information of the current Turn as given by the game
        Returns:
        The calculated Action

      • generateNextTurn

        public Action generateNextTurn(TurnInfo turnInfo)
        Processes the given TurnInfo and splices the information into the maze. Afterwards calculates the next action and returns it
        Parameters:
        turnInfo - The information of the current Turn as given by the game
        Returns:
        The generated Next action

      • processTurnInfo

        protected boolean processTurnInfo(TurnInfo turnInfo)
        Processes the given TurnInfo and updates the information May be overwritten in later implementations to consider future features and mechanics
        Parameters:
        turnInfo - The information of the current Turn as given by the game
        Returns:
        True if the TurnInfo could be processed successfully

      • standardProcess

        protected final boolean standardProcess(TurnInfo turnInfo)
        The standard procedure executed every turn. Updates the position if the last action was successful. Also updates the status of all nearby cells
        Parameters:
        turnInfo - The TurnInfo of the last turn
        Returns:
        True if the position could be updated

      • updatePosition

        private void updatePosition(Direction direction)
        Updates the position the player should reach, if the action is successful. Also validates the new position
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction the player is heading to

      • validatePosition

        private void validatePosition()
        Validates the new position the player should reach. This is used so that the player can wrap around the maze, meaning exiting on one side and appearing on the opposite one.

      • go

        private Action go(Direction direction)
        Lets the player go towards a given direction. Updates the new position of the player and returns a GO Action for the given direction
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction the player is heading towards
        Returns:
        The generated Action

      • reconstructPath

        private java.util.List<Cell> reconstructPath(java.util.Map<Cell,Cell> path,
                                             Cell current)
        An internal function used by the A * algorithm to construct a List of Cells to visit by a map that combines neighbour cells
        Parameters:
        path - The map (cell - neighbour Cell) that describes the path
        current - The starting cell of the path
        Returns:
        The constructed path as list

      • aStar

        protected java.util.List<Cell> aStar(Cell start,
                                     Cell finish)
        An implementation of the A * algorithm that constructs a good path between the given starting cell and the given finish cell
        Parameters:
        start - The starting cell of the path
        finish - The last cell of the path
        Returns:
        The calculated path
        See Also:
        A* algorithm

      • estimateDistance

        protected int estimateDistance(Cell from,
                               Cell to)
        Estimates the distance between the two given cells
        Parameters:
        from - The fist cell
        to - The second cell
        Returns:
        The estimated distance

      • navigateToCell

        protected Action navigateToCell(Cell cell)
        Generates and returns the Action the bot should perform to get towards the given cell. Uses the A* algorithm to navigate
        Parameters:
        cell - The cell to navigate to
        Returns:
        The generated Action
